articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from President of South Africa
    Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Thabo Mbuyelwa Mbeki, president of South Africa.
 The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday by Anil Sooklal, deputy director general of the Department for Asia and the Middle East of the Foreign Ministry, who is heading the government delegation of South Africa on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Government Delegation of S. Africa
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol Meets Cuban Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and conversed with Cuban Ambassador E.P. to the DPRK Esteban Lobaina Romero who paid a farewell call on him Friday.
 On hand were KPA generals and officers and the military attache of the Cuban embassy in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Memos. of Understanding on Negotiations between For. Ministries of DPRK and South Africa
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Government Delegation of S. Africa
    Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a friendly talk with the government delegation of South Africa headed by Anil Sooklal, deputy director general of the Department for Asia and the Middle East of the Foreign Ministry, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned.
